Name: [Ally] Rocketboo
Desc:
All squad members' <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>.
Active Skill: Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies within range and accumulating <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Desc2: Small but functional, it's a great help to Proxies in the Hollows.
